i eat more junk food than i really should.

content.text: Hi, how is your day going?
Good, just got back from a run. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to run too! I also like to listen to rap music, but I don't have children.
That's cool! I have been wanting to learn how to defend myself. I also like to eat junk food, but I'm trying to cut back.
I eat too much junk food too. It's hard to stop! I have trouble finding shoes that fit my big, six-toed foot.
That must be tough! I'm glad my new sneakers are helping with my feet. I cuddle up with my dog every night. Do you have any pets?
I don't have any pets, but I would like to get a dog someday.
They're great companions! I'm glad your day is going well.
